name: Dungeon Mates
description:
In Dungeon Mates you play as a prisoner in a dungeon who gets a new cell mate. Discover bizarre people, answer some questions, make a virtual friend, and have a blast with your new Dungeon Mate.

This game was developed in Gamemaker Studio 2. and was made in a few days for the GameDevNetwork CherryJam!

https://twitter.com/artbywilldata
